Options applied to all auth drivers: Options applied to all auth drivers
Activate the users management system to: Активировать управление пользователями для защиты вашей системы.
Whether the users identifiers should be: Требуется ли в идентификаторах пользователей учитывать регистр букв. WARNING, sql-based drivers will disable this by default, even if you check this.
Enable the 'guest' user, who does not ne: Включить ли гостевой доступ без пароля.
Set the users credentials in the session: Не буду переводить :) Set the users credentials in the session after a successful login, this can be necessary when bridging specific auth and access plugins.
Raise the security of the login form by: Raise the security of the login form by disabling autocompletion and remember me feature
Add a Forgot Password link at the bottom: Add a Forgot Password link at the bottom of the login form
Action to trigger when clicking on Forgo: Action to trigger when clicking on Forgot Password
Master\/slave will assume that the maste: Master/slave will assume that the master is read-only, and the slave is a local alternative to allow sharing features. User Choice will allow the user to manually choose its authentication method at startup.
This is necessary to discriminate users: This is necessary to discriminate users data loaded from various sources. Warning, use foldername compliant characters. For example :: does not work!
Will be shown to the user at login: Will be shown to the user at login
In Master_Slave mode, use this option to: In Master_Slave mode, use this option to limit the users listing in the administration to one driver only (leave empty if you want to see all users)
Create a local copy (at login time) of m: Create a local copy (at login time) of master users inside slave base
Disable the check of failed login attemp: Disable the check of failed login attempts, will disable the Captcha display
